overview: Shinji’s life has been ruined by the crime that his brother, Kyosuke, committed. Unable to forgive him, Shinji keeps his brother’s crime a secret from his fiancée. As Kyosuke is about to be released from prison, Shinji’s fiancée discovers the secret and leaves him. He is also left to reconcile with his estranged mother, while being pestered by a journalist who prompts him to rethink the reason for his brother’s actions.
title: Unforgettable
